DOC.criteria: Early HIV Infection HIV seropositive viral load < 100,000 copies/ml CD4+ > 350 cells/ul Ability willingness give write informed consent . Control Group HIV seronegative subject identify HIV uninfected nonreactive HIV 1/2 ELISA . Ability willingness give write informed consent . Presentation opportunistic infection AIDSdefining illness . Receipt investigational research agent within 30 day prior study entry . Prior receipt experimental HIV vaccine , sham vector adjuvant .
